feature: Git History Cleanup via Interactive Rebase
goals: Squash iterative/WIP commits into atomic feature commits
Ensure 'Atomic Commit' principles (one feature, one commit)
Clean up history since v1.0 release

tasks.title: Safety Backup & Stash
tasks.description: Create a backup branch `backup/pre-rebase` and stash uncommitted changes to ensure no data loss.

tasks.title: Reset to v1.0 Base
tasks.description: Perform `git reset --soft 36289d8` (release v1.0) to stage all subsequent changes.

tasks.title: Atomic Commit: Admin Import System
tasks.description: Group all Admin Import/Export & Data Editor changes into one or two atomic commits (e.g., `feat(admin): overhaul data import system`).

tasks.title: Atomic Commit: Statistics & API
tasks.description: Group Stats enhancements (Bullet Chart, Heatmap) and related API optimizations into purely functional commits.

tasks.title: Atomic Commit: UI & Polish
tasks.description: Group UI changes (Logo, Icons, Dark Mode tweaks) into a dedicated style/UI commit.

tasks.title: Restore Environment
tasks.description: Pop the stash to restore uncommitted work and verify the new history.
